description:
Jesús Espino - Playing with CPython Objects Internals
[EuroPython 2015]
[22 July 2015]
[Bilbao, Euskadi, Spain]

I will explain how CPython objects are built, from simple objects
like int or None to complex ones like dict. To make it funnier, I
will play to change instance data directly using ctypes and do
"really bad things" like truncating tuples.
title: Playing with CPython Objects Internals
